subject: Return Items
description_text: Hello,     I'd like to return the steering wheel and the shifter. There isn't anything wrong with them, I just don't like how the shifter shifts. The steering wheel quick release doesnt work for my wheelbase (simagic alpha evo), I went with the neo x steering wheel instead. The quick release is not 6/4 like many of the other quick releases.     Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi William Mac,  Please provide your order number first so we can review it. This situation may not be covered by our refund policy.

Here are the order #s.

I read your return policy and I believe this will qualify.

Thanks

William Mac
*Data Scientist/Consultant/Engineer*
Cell: (909)272-6728
Email: william.mac1990@gmail.com
